QuestData.Title: Ashyo's Vision
QuestData.Description: Have a look at that!$B$B<Ashyo motions at the massive waterfall to the north.>$B$BThis must be the water supply for the whole valley!$B$BThink about it, $n: the pandaren use this water to grow vegetables the size of a house. Where could it come from? What is so special about it?$B$BThe elders among my people know a technique for speaking with the water and divining the future. Perhaps this same technique can provide insight into the water's source...$B$BIt's worth a shot at least!
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak with Ashyo at the Pools of Purity and observe his ritual.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is that jinyu up to over there?
QuestData.RewardText: I can't believe he was able to see that with a stick... perhaps there is more to "crazy jinyu rituals" than we thought.
